item.title: Triumph T509 horrible tank paint job. Warning it's horrible
item.description: When I first go to Munich, I was pretty determined that I was gonna buy a motorcycle to ride in the German and Austrain alps with. I spent quite some time looking at ebay for offers and one day I found this amazing tornado red (yes that is the actual color name) T509 Speed Triple from 1998. I noticed on the ebay add that it had quite a lot of stickers on it, which I didn’t really like, but I bought it anyway and only ended up paying 1600 euros for it.
